name: Symphonics: Make Music in VR
description: A unique way to compose music in VR by physically manipulating the melodies and beats you write. Interact with your songs in a completely new way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
